description: {"blocks":[{"key":"fjdn0","text":"The analysis of relative protein abundance has emerged as an important tool in cell biology. Typically, it is possible to quantify \u003e8000 proteins under standard conditions. Tandem Mass Tags (TMT) are isobaric reagents that contain a set of isotopically distinct reporter ions, which can be used to quantify individual peptides in distinct samples through multiplexing(McAlister et al., 2014). Because the TMT analysis is performed in multiplexed format (up to 18 plex), it is possible to examine the effect of different perturbations (treatments, time courses, etc) on the total abundance of the proteome and include replicate samples as desired. This protocol is applicable to many different cell types, although the number of proteins quantified may differ, depending on the complexity of the proteomes in individual cell types. The small amount of protein needed (50-100 ug) makes application of this approach simple for many different types of cells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":368,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":368,"length":22}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"F91E25F8FABE11EB878B0A58A9FEAC02","url":"applewebdata://8AC23749-8314-4097-9D47-838582FD0B6E#_ENREF_40"}}}}

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"alakb","text":"Mass spectrometry:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a1kam","text":"The analysis of TMT-labelled peptides by mass spectrometry will depend on the type of instrument/platform used. Typical instrument settings for analysis on a Thermo Fusion Lumos instrument are provided in the following section.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"43l2e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fiqr8","text":"Inject 3 μl for each LC–MS/MS analysis using available mass spectrometer with a 120-minute online LC separation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fpmbt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dkmep","text":"Search raw data against UniProt human protein database using any proteomic analysis software with the following parameters:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dc1vb","text":"-Up to 3 missed cleavages allowed for trypsin/LysC digestion","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aiben","text":"-Carbamidomethyl (C), TMT (N-term peptide and K) set as a fixed modification","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cqo9o","text":"-Oxidation (M) and di-glycine (K) set as variable modifications","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a0ii2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c4k2e","text":"Extract signal to noise intensity values of each TMT reporter and identified proteins, and further calculate the ratio of each condition to the control sample’s intensity.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6gp9f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9fe7l","text":"Instrument settings:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5i4b8","text":"Mass spectrometry data were collected using an Orbitrap Fusion Lumos mass spectrometer (Thermo Fisher Scientific, San Jose, CA) coupled to a Proxeon EASY-nLC1200 liquid chromatography (LC) pump (Thermo Fisher Scientific). Peptides were separated on a 100 μm inner diameter microcapillary column packed in house with ~35 cm of Accucore150 resin (2.6 μm, 150 Å, ThermoFisher Scientific, San Jose, CA) with a gradient consisting of 3%–26% (0-100 min), 26-32% (100-110min) (ACN, 0.1% FA) over a total 120 min run at ~400 nL/min.For analysis, we loaded 1/3 of each fraction onto the column. Each analysis used the Multi-Notch MS3-based TMT method(McAlister et al., 2014). The scan sequence began with an MS1spectrum (Orbitrap analysis; resolution 120,000 at 200 Th; mass range 400−1250 m/z; automatic gain control (AGC) target 1×106; maximum injection time 100 ms). Precursors for MS2analysis were selected using a Top 4 sec method. MS2analysis consisted of collision-induced dissociation (quadrupole Orbitrap analysis; AGC 1×105; isolation window 0.7 Th; normalized collision energy (NCE) 35; maximum injection time 300 ms resolution was 7,500 at 200 Th).Monoisotopic peak assignment was used, and previously interrogated precursors were excluded using a dynamic window (120 s ± 7 ppm).Following acquisition of each MS2spectrum, a synchronous-precursor-selection (SPS) MS3scan was collected on the top 10 most intense ions in the MS2spectrum(McAlister et al., 2014). MS3precursors were fragmented by high energy collision-induced dissociation (HCD) and analyzed using the Orbitrap (NCE 65; AGC 2×105;maximum injection time 500 ms, resolution was 50,000 at 200 Th).","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":623,"length":1},{"style":"sup","offset":701,"length":1},{"style":"sup","offset":826,"length":1},{"style":"sup","offset":878,"length":1},{"style":"sup","offset":930,"length":1},{"style":"sup","offset":1023,"length":1},{"style":"sup","offset":1314,"length":1},{"style":"sup","offset":1367,"length":1},{"style":"sup","offset":1428,"length":1},{"style":"sup","offset":1465,"length":1},{"style":"sup","offset":1594,"length":1},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":642,"length":22},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":1438,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":642,"length":22},{"key":1,"offset":1438,"length":22}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"B6D5A489FBA911EB878B0A58A9FEAC02","url":"applewebdata://81C1138F-1064-4DE3-974E-C346E29005E9#_ENREF_40"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"B6D5A4E5FBA911EB878B0A58A9FEAC02","url":"applewebdata://81C1138F-1064-4DE3-974E-C346E29005E9#_ENREF_40"}}}}
keywords: Tandem Mass Tagging-based proteomics,Whole-cell proteomics and Analysis,ASAPCRN
manuscript_citation: - McAlister, G. C. et al. MultiNotch MS3 Enables Accurate, Sensitive, and Multiplexed Detection of Differential Expression across Cancer Cell Line Proteomes. Analytical chemistry 86, 7150 7158 (2014). - Paulo, J.A., et al. Quantitative mass spectrometry-based multiplexing compares the abundance of 5000 S. cerevisiae proteins across 10 carbon sources. J Proteomics 148, 85-93 (2016a).

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5v77k","text":"For whole proteome analysis,    is required for each replicate. Lyse cells in lysis buffer and pass them through a 21G needle 10 times. Alternatively, lyse cells by","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":29,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e7hi","text":"sonication as per manufactures instructions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"ABE54290FB7B11EB9368115398A48887","id":0,"label":"of protein lysate","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}}}}

Reduce lysates for   at   with   , and alkylate cysteine residues with  ( ,  ).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":53,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":141,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":146,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":153,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":193,"length":1},{"key":5,"offset":195,"length":1},{"key":6,"offset":198,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8f96f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"FD464750FB7C11EB9368115398A48887","id":0,"label":"of lysate ","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":1200,"guid":"4063ACD0FB7D11EB9368115398A48887","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"4743C6C0FB7D11EB9368115398A48887","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"3":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"","data":{"concentration":"5","error_concentration":false,"guid":"7801CDC0FB7D11EB9368115398A48887","id":0,"label":"TCEP","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"4":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"","data":{"concentration":"20","error_concentration":false,"guid":"9DF2F040FB7D11EB9368115398A48887","id":0,"label":"Chloroacetamide ","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"5":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"B0499C30FB7D11EB9368115398A48887","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"6":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"B6CF8830FB7D11EB9368115398A48887","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1abnv","text":"Extract protein content by methanol-chloroform precipitation and subsequent MeOH washes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7qms3","text":"Digest samples at   for   with endoproteinase Lys-C (Wako, Japan) at a 1/200 enzyme/protein ratio.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":18,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":24,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5ittu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"BB3DCCE0FB7F11EB9368115398A48887","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"C46083D0FB7F11EB9368115398A48887","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c56c3","text":" Add   to each sample. Solubilize TMT reagents are in ACN as per manufacturer’s instructions and    is used for every  . Performe TMT labeling in a final concentration of 20-25% ACN. Add    to bring the reaction volume at 125 µL.The number of samples, and hence the number of individual TMT reagents, will depend upon the design of the experiment.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":5,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":97,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":118,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":187,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bleg9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"35B8EEF0FB8011EB9368115398A48887","id":0,"label":"of the TMT reagent","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"52515660FB8011EB9368115398A48887","id":0,"label":"of TMT label","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"625ADE00FB8011EB9368115398A48887","id":0,"label":"of protein lysate","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"7A225C70FB8011EB9368115398A48887","id":0,"label":"of ACN","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1f3t5","text":"Aspirate and discard the upper aqueous phase. Do not disturb the protein disc at the interface of the aqueous phase (top) and organic phase (bottom).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"79mu2","text":"Air dry (or speed-vac) protein pellet down to remove all traces of MeOH.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dmlf2","text":"Aspirate and discard supernatant. Do not disturb the protein pellet at the bottom of the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"11l10","text":"Combine 1% of each labeled sample together in a tube, quench the reaction with    for   at  , and dry down using the speed-vac. This combined sample is used to perform the ratio check to test labeling efficiency. The remaining amount of each sample can be stored in the freezer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":79,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":86,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":91,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"4","error":false,"guid":"DD62D6C0FB8011EB9368115398A48887","id":0,"label":"of 5% hydroxylamine","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"E2E24F40FB8011EB9368115398A48887","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"E94C27C0FB8011EB9368115398A48887","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2o9tk","text":"Resuspend the dried sample in   . Check to ensure that the pH of the sample is ~  (or lower) using pH strip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":30,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":80,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"78r51","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"2A80A900FB8111EB9368115398A48887","id":0,"label":"of 5% FA/5% ACN","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"ph","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"480F9DC001C911ECB7430F40A80669A1","id":0,"number":"3"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d7f59","text":"Make stage tip by placing 6-8 “cookies” of C-18 embedded membranes in  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":70,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fabp3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"4EF7D5B0FB8111EB9368115398A48887","id":0,"label":"Rainin tip","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6t169","text":"Load sample on to C-18 to bind peptides.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bvc9n","text":"Wash bound peptides on C-18 with   .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":33,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"31E9AC90FB8211EB9368115398A48887","id":0,"label":"of 5% ACN/5% FA","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2cvbr","text":"Elute peptides off C-18 with    into a mass spec vial.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":29,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d31uc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"5E648BA0FB8211EB9368115398A48887","id":0,"label":"75% ACN/ 5% FA","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"90kl7","text":"Perform ratio check by analyzing the total amount of reporter ions present, as measured by mass spectrometry, for each TMT reporter ion channel.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bemgv","text":"Quench the entire volume of each sample using    for   at  . Combine samples in 2 ml Eppendorf tube to equal amounts, based on normalization values you obtain from the ratio check.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":46,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":53,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":58,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"68s14","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"8","error":false,"guid":"CF867D70FB8211EB9368115398A48887","id":0,"label":"of 5% hydroxylamine","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"D6DB7940FB8211EB9368115398A48887","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"DC293360FB8211EB9368115398A48887","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":32}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"easbk","text":"Place SepPak column into vacuum slot on a vacuum manifold.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3esnn","text":"Start the vacuum, gently, try to ensure that the pressure gauge is below 10. This can be achieved by opening one of the valves gently. The fluid should pass through slowly, drop wise.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eh80i","text":"Fill SepPak with   , Flow Liquid through, repeat 2 more times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":17,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"edd7r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"5FE39CA0FBA511EB9368115398A48887","id":0,"label":"5% FA/5% ACN","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ckk9c","text":"Replace 15 ml collection tube with 2 ml collection tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"k96p","text":"Elute with  . Since there is residual liquid left in the SepPak, ensure that all the liquid flows through SepPak.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":11,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"10ogs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"750","error":false,"guid":"A2D166A0FBA511EB9368115398A48887","id":0,"label":"75% ACN/5% FA","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d74md","text":"Fractionate samples by high-pH reverse-phase HPLC (Agilent LC1260) into 96 fractions over a   run.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":92,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a6r74","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":5400,"guid":"4B148130FBA611EB9368115398A48887","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5aa06","text":"Fractions are run through an Aeris peptide XB-c18 column (Phenomenex; 250 mm x 3.6 mm), with mobile phase A containing   and      and phase B containing   and      (all inLC-MS grade H20).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":184,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":119,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":125,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":127,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":153,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":159,"length":1},{"key":5,"offset":161,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1m4ie","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"","data":{"concentration":"5","error_concentration":false,"guid":"4F54778001CA11ECB7430F40A80669A1","id":0,"label":"ACN","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1425}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"","data":{"concentration":"10","error_concentration":false,"guid":"5E25581001CA11ECB7430F40A80669A1","id":0,"label":"NH4HCO3","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"2":{"type":"ph","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"7F109EE001CA11ECB7430F40A80669A1","id":0,"number":"8"}},"3":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"","data":{"concentration":"90","error_concentration":false,"guid":"86431E9001CA11ECB7430F40A80669A1","id":0,"label":"ACN","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1425}},"4":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"","data":{"concentration":"10","error_concentration":false,"guid":"9968B34001CA11ECB7430F40A80669A1","id":0,"label":"NH4HCO3","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"5":{"type":"ph","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"AEA010F001CA11ECB7430F40A80669A1","id":0,"number":"8"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fpnvh","text":"Combine fractionated samples (either 12 or 24 fractions) in a non-continuous manner into individual 1.5 ml Eppendorf tube (see outline below form Paulo et al., 2016).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":146,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":146,"length":18}],"data":{}},{"key":"49hc6","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"40q15","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"8702437DFBA611EB878B0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/27432472"}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"952F9AC0FBA611EB9368115398A48887","height":259,"id":394950,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nbyibitt7.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nbygbitt7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nbyhbitt7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nbyfbitt7.webp","width":215}}}}

Spin down at   .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":46,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"btge9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"3000","duration":180,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"31F322A0FBA711EB9368115398A48887","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}
